title: LF Melbourne Top and Mid Diamond 4+
body:
We are looking for a top and mid that is currently diamond 4+ in solo queue.
Requirements:
Has a flexible champion pool
Can play most days
Working microphone
Living in Melbourne and willing to play LAN.

Add me in game if interested: Diamond 5

replies.body: Oof where were you when I used to be active, I'm from melb but took a long brea q.q
